content.rendered: Christian Pfeiff joined Mannheimer Swartling in 1994 and has worked as a partner in the firm’s Stockholm and New York City offices. He is currently based in Stockholm and works in the Dispute Resolution Practice Group providing services to international as well as Scandinavian clients. During the twelve years he has worked full time with dispute resolution. His experience includes representing clients in large, multi-party international arbitrations involving multiple jurisdictions. In addition, Christian Pfeiff frequently represents clients before Swedish courts in cases relating to commercial disputes. Besides Swedish law, he has handled cases governed by foreign laws.
